title: The Pythagorean Theorem
text: $$a^2+b^2=c^2$$ or side a squared plus side $$b$$ squared $$=$$ hypotenuse squared.
speech: a squared plus b squared, is equal to, c squared  or side a squared plus side  b  squared  is equal to  hypotenuse squared.
pacedSpeech: a squared plus b squared, is equal to, c squared
or side a squared plus side   b
